title: TERMINATE WINTER RYE COVER CROPS WITH THIS HACK!

tasks.task: Placing a winter rye cover crop as sheet mulch in a no-till garden.
subtasks: Growing the winter rye cover crop.
Crimping the winter rye cover crop using T-posts.
Tarping the crimped winter rye cover crop.
Watering the tarp to assist in killing the cover crop.
Removing the tarp after the cover crop has died.
Adding compost to the treated bed.
Mulching the bed with wood chips.
Measuring and setting up garden beds.

tasks.task: Planting habanero peppers in the prepared bed.
subtasks: Raking compost onto the bed and smoothing it.
Filling in gaps with wood chips.
